verses.roman:
"śuni, caitanya-gaṇa kare bahuta bhakṣaṇa
'satya' sei vākya,--sākṣāt dekhiluṅ ekhana

synonyms: śuni—I have heard; caitanya-gaṇa—the followers of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kare bahuta bhakṣaṇa—eat more than necessary; satya—true; sei vākya—that statement; sākṣāt—directly; dekhiluṅ—I have seen; ekhana—now.
translation: "I have heard," he said,"that the followers of Caitanya Mahāprabhu eat more than necessary. Now I have directly seen that this is true.
